feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Retail API

entry.content:
The Vertex AI Search for commerce Merchandising console introduces self-serve and agentic explainability for issue diagnosis. Streamlined governance is supported with distinct Creator and Approver roles. New features enhance preview and provide real-time control application feedback.

For more information, see Serving controls in the Merchandising console.
entry.summary: The Vertex AI Search for commerce Merchandising console now offers self-serve and agentic explainability for issue diagnosis. It also features streamlined governance with Creator and Approver roles, along with enhanced preview and real-time feedback on control application.
entry.title: Feature: Merchandising console updates

entry.content:
Vertex AI Search for commerce: Additional languages added to search (GA)

Additional languages, including Urdu and Serbian (Cyrillic), are supported in Vertex AI Search for commerce.

For a list of the languages supported, see Supported world languages.
entry.summary: Vertex AI Search for commerce now supports additional languages, including Urdu and Serbian (Cyrillic). This expansion enhances search capabilities for a wider range of global customers.
entry.title: Feature: New Languages for Vertex AI Search

entry.content:
Vertex AI Search for commerce: Conversational product filtering

As part of Search for commerce's Guided search package, ConversationalSearchSpec sits on top of the Vertex AI Search for commerce. When coverage parameters are met, Search for commerce users can enable this feature in the console or by setting the followup_conversation_requested flag to true in the search service interface. Conversational product filtering uses an LLM-generated question for each catalog attribute where allowed_in_conversation field is enabled.

For more information, see Conversational product filtering.
entry.summary: A new feature for Search for commerce that allows for conversational product filtering.
entry.title: Feature: Conversational Product Filtering

entry.content:
Vertex AI Search for commerce: Conversational Commerce agent, GA

The Conversational Commerce agent uses LLM and conversational product filtering to provide users with a real-time, ongoing conversational experience. The conversational product filtering feature functions as part of the Guided Search package, helping narrow down search queries sooner by presenting users with either relevant products, follow-up questions, or both.

The Conversational Commerce agent is generally available (GA). For information, see Conversational Commerce agent and Conversational product filtering.
entry.summary: The new Conversational Commerce agent for Vertex AI Search is now generally available. This feature enhances the shopping experience by using LLMs and conversational product filtering to provide real-time, interactive product discovery.
entry.title: Feature: Conversational Commerce Agent Now Generally Available
